name: raffledashboard
description: A Dashboard for the Raffle System of a charity project

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start"  "cd client && npm start"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd server && npm run serve"  "cd client && npm run serve"
scripts.startb: concurrently "cd server && npm run serve"  "cd client && npm run bs"
scripts.installAll: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install

author: NickMarcha
